net.mdwright.var

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mdwright.var.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for retrieving historical data using the Yahoo Finance API API Used: https://financequotes-api.com/

      • getHistoricalPrices

        public static void getHistoricalPrices(Portfolio portfolio,
                                       java.util.Calendar startDate,
                                       java.util.Calendar endDate)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Method to retrieve historical stock data from Yahoo Finance via API.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - The portfolio object to gather data for.
        startDate - Calendar object of the starting date to gather data from
        endDate - Calendar object of the ending date to gather data to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a connection error occurs or the response is invalid

      • getHistoricalPrices

        public static void getHistoricalPrices(Portfolio portfolio,
                                       int dataLength)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Method to retrieve historical stock data from Yahoo Finance via API using datalength.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - The portfolio boject to gather data for.
        dataLength - Number of days to go back in time for data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a connection error occurs or the response is invalid

      • getFxQuote

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getFxQuote(java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                                              java.lang.String toCurrency)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Method for retrieving foreign exchange quotes to perform currency exchange.
        Parameters:
        fromCurrency - String value representing the abbreviated currency to convert from (e.g. USD)
        toCurrency - String value representing the abbreviated currency to convert to (e.g. GBP)
        Returns:
        A BigDecimal value representing the conversion rate (e.g. 1 USD to 0.75 GBP would return 0.75)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a connection error occurs or the response is invalid

      • getCurrentQuote

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getCurrentQuote(Position position)
        Method for retrieving the current price per unit of an asset in GBP.
        Parameters:
        position - The target position object
        Returns:
        BigDecimal value representing the current GBP price

      • getCurrentValue

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getCurrentValue(Position position)
        Method for retrieving the cumulative price of a position.
        Parameters:
        position - The target position object
        Returns:
        BigDecimal value representing the current GBP price of the holdings

      • getCurrentPortfolioValue

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getCurrentPortfolioValue(Portfolio portfolio)
        Method for retrieving the current total value of the portfolio using previously retrieved current values.
        Parameters:
        portfolio - The target portfolio object
        Returns:
        BigDecimal value representing the current GBP price of all holdings in the portfolio

      • testStockIsValid

        public static boolean testStockIsValid(java.lang.String tickerSymbol)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Method for checking if a provided tickerSymbol is a valid symbol.
        Parameters:
        tickerSymbol - String representation of the stock's ticker symbol
        Returns:
        Boolean value, true if the stock exists and false if it doesn't
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When there is a connection error
